pic1_alt: The logo of groundhog-day.com, consisting of a line drawing of a groundhog face.
pic2_alt: All predictions by year. All results for yearly Groundhog Day predictions. Recorded predictions go back to 1886. A table of predictions from 2014 to 2023 showing the year, prediction, spring votes, winter votes, consensus percent voting for whicher was higher, and the total number of predictions. The consensus is 'early spring' for 7 of 10 years. The consensus is beween 51% and 67% each year.
